jobInfo.postDescription:
Job TITLE: Software Testing Engineer
Function: Engineering/Technology   
 
Description:
The individual will be primarily responsible carrying out test engineering activities for products. Responsibility includes carrying out all the activities in the test life cycle such as developing, maintaining and executing test cases etc. 

Key responsibilities include:
-    Lead product software verification activity, include prepare test plan & summary, design/review/execute test cases, defects management etc.
-         Prepare test setup required for test execution
-         Participate in technical reviews and contributing to tech discussions
-         Contribute in decision making for make/stop a release
-         Analyze requirements and report out testable/not testable
-    Other tasks from manager.
  Quality Specific Goals:
1.   Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position
2.   Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines
3.   Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required
4.  Ensure compliance/closure of Regulatory and Quality requirements before completing Design Outputs/Program Deliverables
5.   Participate in continuous improvement activities by supporting the implementation of process and product quality improvement initiatives.
 
Qualifications/Requirements:
1. Graduation in science/Engineering and at least 3 years of software testing experience.
2. Should have good knowledge of software testing methodology/processes and software development life cycle.
3. Strong in Manual testing methodologies
4. Work well with teams and across Global environment
5. Adherence to process
6. English skills: Reading & Writing is MUST; Listening & Speaking is plus.  
7. Lead software testing team or project experience and ability is plus.
8. Scrum practice working experience is plus.
jobInfo.address: 无锡新吴区通用电气医疗系统(中国)有限公司19号

brandComInfo.introduce:
公司网址：http://www.huaxsoft.com

公司简介
       华信永益创建于享有中国硅谷美誉的北京中关村， 总部设在北京，同时在上海、南京、杭州和成都设有分公司和办事处，公司凝聚了拥有理想与智慧的IT行业精英人才，专门从事应用软件开发、软件外包、信息系统集成、医疗咨询及解决方案、互联网技术与应用开发的高科技企业。
         我们致力于为各行业客户提供完美的解决方案，共同打造一家“懂得需求落地、力求完美体验”的公司。我们致力于追求客户利益最大化、追求优质满意的服务、追求可持续发展的战略方针、追求以人为本的生存之道，致力于为我们的客户提供完美的解决方案和一流的IT服务。
        华信永益公司高管团队来联想集团、中软集团和东软集团高级管理职位，拥有丰富的经营和管理经验，技术负责人曾任亚信、用友等公司的CTO，是美国PMI协会PMP会员、高级信息项目管理师，中国系统与软件过程改进协会主任专家会员，拥有着丰富的技术和项目管理经验。


公司愿景与价值观

愿景：成为一家国内公认的IT服务行业领导公司，为客户提供高价值的创新性和可持续性服务。
核心价值观：责任与持续创新。对社会、客户、伙伴、员工、投资人和员工负责，这也是华信永益存在的理由；持续创新就是勤于总结，善于学习，主动应对变化, 永远追求卓越，这是华信永益不断前进的动力。
